title: Auth0 Authentication API webhooks
name: auth0-authentication-api-webhooks
author: auth0
description: Allows you to define webhooks for Auth0's Authentication API. It will go through the audit logs and call a webhook for specific events.

BATCH_SIZE.description: The ammount of logs to be read on each execution. Maximun is 100.

WEBHOOK_CONCURRENT_CALLS.description: The maximum concurrent calls that will be made to your webhook

LOG_LEVEL.description: This allows you to specify the log level of events that need to be sent
LOG_LEVEL.example: e.g.: 1 for Debug messages, 2 for Info messages, etc

LOG_TYPES.description: If you only want to send events with a specific type (eg: failed logins)
LOG_TYPES.example: e.g.: 's' for Success Login, 'du' for Deleted User, etc
